titleStmt.title: The churches duty, for received mercies. Discovered in a sermon preached before the Honourable House of Commons: at Margarets Westminster, Feb. 24. 1646. being the day of the solemne monthly fast. / By John Greene Minister of Gods Word, and a member of the Assembly of Divines.
titleStmt.author: Greene, John, Master of Arts.
